title: Profile
name: Name
photoUploadErrorFile: File is not a valid file
passwordResetEmailSent: Password reset email sent to your email address
passwordResetError: Password reset email could not be sent

deleteAccount.title: Delete My Account
deleteAccount.description: Follow the steps below to delete your account.
deleteAccount.warning: This action is irreversible. When you delete your account, all your data will be permanently deleted.
deleteAccount.notAllowed: You do not have permission to delete accounts. Only admin users can delete accounts.

consequences.title: When you delete your account:
consequences.item1: Your store and all settings will be deleted.
consequences.item2: All your ads will be removed from the platform.
consequences.item3: All user accounts associated with your store will be deleted.
consequences.item4: All your payment information and subscriptions will be canceled.
consequences.item5: All your data on the platform will be lost.

deleteAccount.info: We recommend that you back up important data before deleting your account.
deleteAccount.textConfirmationHelp: You must exactly type 'delete my account' to delete your account.

emailMismatch: The email address you entered does not match your account email address.
textMismatch: Please exactly type 'delete my account' to delete your account.
accountDeleteError: Your account could not be deleted. Please try again later.
accountDeletedSuccess: Your account has been deleted successfully. You are being redirected...
